original: intros t l1 l2 H1 H2. apply cover_ind with (l := l1) (b := t). - intros t. apply cover_one. - intros l1' l2' t1 t2 t3 H3 H4 IH. apply cover_node with (t1 := t1) (t2 := t2) (t3 := t3). + apply permutation_trans with (l2 := t1 :: t2 :: l2). * apply H3. * apply permutation_cons_ex in H4. destruct H4 as [l3 [l4 [H4 H5]]]. subst. apply permutation_skip. apply IH. + apply H4.
